description:
Smoothie is the favorite drink among kids in summer. Everyone have fun making healthy, delicious & colorful smoothie but ever heard of gross smoothie challenge?
Well we bring you another addition to our food challenge game series. Gross smoothie challenge game which is real fun to play. Kids love to do a lot of challenges with food these days so its time to try our smoothie challenge which you can play against any of your friends and even against your cell phone.
So win or lose the gross smoothie challenge in which you have to beat your rival with the higher score and a good pizza. Come on and challenge your friends!

Smoothie Challenge Rules & Game Play:
1- Play Smoothie challenge vs your cell phone or any of your friend.
2- Toss and get a jar number to reveal a smoothie item.
3- This item can be a good smoothie or a gross smoothie item.
4- If you get a gross smoothie item you will lose a point.
5- Then one who loses 5 lives will lose the smoothie challenge.
6- Try to make good smoothies by revealing all good items

Download this amazing food challenge kids game for free and have tons of fum with your friend. Smoothie challenge is very famous among kids these days why not trying it yourself with your friends on your cellphone today. Have the fun of smoothie maker game along with challenges. Beat your rival.
